title: E3 Is Back! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.06.21
description:
Visit http://joinhoney.com/games to get Honey for free.

Gary and Greg talk about the ESA coming back with an all virtual #E32021 that's got the backing of #Xbox, #Nintendo, and more. Also, Gary blames IGN's Rebekah Valentine for ruining his daughter's life. (Kinda.)

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
#andrearenestrong
A New PS I Love You XOXO is up and talking Ratchet and Clank as well as The Show coming to Game Pass!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:06:45 - E3 is Back! ESA
00:20:10 - What is Microsoft doing at E3? - Best Friends Q: Borzen00
00:37:35 - With the announcement of E3 coming back with several large publishers joining in - would love to hear 1 Tim "get hype" moment from both of you, that you'd love to see. - Best Friends Q:Sapphire Diamond ruby
00:40:50 - PS Now’s New Games Aren’t PS5 Versions, Sammy Barker @ Push Square
00:45:50 - Borderlands Movie Deets, Matt TM Kim @ IGN
00:49:10 -  Ad 
00:52:10 - Gary, You buying these Build-A-Bear Animal Crossing Things, RV @ IGN
00:59:00 - Out today 
01:02:10 - Squad Up: Sam (xbox) - gksam10
01:05:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
